schema.title: Response Delete Shift Api V1 Shifts  Shift Id  Delete
Response Delete Role Api V1 Rules Roles  Role Id  Delete
Response Delete Permission Api V1 Rules Permissions  Permission Id  Delete
Response Delete Block Api V1 Blocks  Block Id  Delete
Response Delete Well Api V1 Wells  Well Id  Delete

get.summary: Get List Which User Can See

post.summary: Create a new checklist for a task
post.description: Creates a new checklist associated with a specific task. The checklist will be empty initially.

get.summary: Get all checklists for a task
get.description: Retrieves all checklists associated with a specific task, including their items.

get.summary: Get a specific checklist by ID
get.description: Retrieves a specific checklist by its ID, including all its items.

post.summary: Add an item to a checklist
post.description: Adds a new item to an existing checklist.

put.description: Updates the checked status of a specific item in a checklist.

get.description:
Get all files attached to a task.

Args:
    task_id: The ID of the task
    
Returns:
    TaskFileList containing all files attached to the task
